pageContext.claim: “During the same period and the same trip to Saudi Arabia, which was my great honor, representing our incredible country, his highness personally asked me to expedite a $5 billion agreement for the sale of American F/A-18 Super Hornet fighting jets for Kuwait. I am pleased to report that the State Department has now authorized this transferred purchase, which will not only strengthen our mutual security, but will greatly benefit American workers.”
pageContext.analysis: The deal was actually approved by the Defense Security Cooperation Agency on Nov. 17, nine days after Trump was elected and more than two months before he would take the oath of office
